name: Sumo Puckii
description:
Sumo Puckii is a couch-sitting two player sumo-wrestling/bumper boats hybrid with a focus on minimalism, decimating friendships, and occasionally depressed walks along a river bank by yourself, wondering if you are worth anything at all, if maybe your Sumo Puckii skills are indicative of your overall value as a human being. Maybe everything you've done for the past couple decades has been for nothing...

Sumo Puckii.

Now on OUYA!




"Best combination of Beyblades and large, agile men." -Indiecent Exposure
